bug.author: alalek
bug.summary: G-API: valgrind issues with uninitialized values (2019-10-04)
bug.description: <denchmark-link:http://pullrequest.opencv.org/buildbot/builders/master_valgrind-lin64-debug/builds/10195>Valgrind build</denchmark-link> . Errors are from test system bootstrap: <denchmark-code>==14114== 4544 errors in context 1 of 4: ==14114== Conditional jump or move depends on uninitialised value(s) ==14114== at 0x686EF31: printf_positional (vfprintf.c:2022) ==14114== by 0x6871CB9: vfprintf (vfprintf.c:1688) ==14114== by 0x6947168: __vsnprintf_chk (vsnprintf_chk.c:63) ==14114== by 0x6947094: __snprintf_chk
